text: Stavnytsia () is a village of the Letychiv Raion, Khmelnytskyi Oblast in western Ukraine. The population of the village is around 1 121 persons.Село Ставниця: карта вулиць Local government is administered by Medzhybizh village council.Меджибізька селищна (сільська) рада == Geography == The village is located on the left bank of the river Buzhok, at the confluence of the Southern Bug and Buzhok rivers. It is a not far from the Highway M12 (Ukraine) (') at a distance from the district center Letychiv, from the regional center of Khmelnytskyi, and from the city of Vinnytsia. == History and Attractions == In the village are preserved the ruins of the castle Nevitske - "Castle Rakoczy". This - the only monument the 16th century of fortification that has been saved in Ukraine. The first mention of the castle appeared in the 1274th year. In 1644, the castle was destroyed by the Hungarian Monarch Ferenc Rakoczy. On the outskirts of the village were found Scythian settlements and settlement Cherniakhivska culture. == Born in the village Stavnytsia == * Anatoly Kashpirovsky (August 11, 1939) – a self-professed mass healer and hypnotizer who made his name on Russia's national television in the rocky years surrounding the collapse of the Soviet Union. == References == == External links == * Археологія та стародавня історія Летичівського району * Ставниця - Меджибіж: фортеця "замок Ракоці" * weather.in.ua/ Stavnytsia (Khmelnytskyi region) Category:Villages in Khmelnytskyi Oblast
title: Stavnytsia
